name: Eli Girls
description:
Eli Girls - an adventure game in which you have to play for the naked queen.

You are the ruler of a small female kingdom. But now you are a prisoner of the undead. The lattice is open and now you need to find a way out of the castle.


Unfortunately all your clothes have been destroyed. But without it, it will be easier to move and pass obstacles. There are special rewards you can get when traveling.
